Smart Coffee Mug: A coffee mug that connects to your smartphone app and tracks your daily coffee intake, monitors your caffeine levels, and sends reminders when it's time to refill.
Coffee Mug with Built-In Speaker: A coffee mug that comes with a built-in speaker, allowing you to listen to your favorite music or podcasts while sipping your coffee.
Coffee Mug with Charging Dock: A coffee mug that comes with a built-in charging dock, allowing you to charge your phone or other devices while you sip your coffee.
Coffee Mug with Heating Function: A coffee mug that comes with a built-in heating function, allowing you to keep your coffee at the perfect temperature all day long.
Coffee Mug with LED Lights: A coffee mug that comes with built-in LED lights, allowing you to customize the color and brightness of the lights to suit your mood or preference.
